overview: Thomas Daly, President and Chief Technology Officer (CTO), of Dyn Inc. As CTO, Tom is responsible for aligning the technical operations of the company to the strategic goals set by the CEO. Tom is responsible for the architecture of the Dynect Platform (a globally anycast, fault resilient, DNS management system for enterprises and TLD operators) and DynDNS.com. Tom has been working for Dyn Inc. since 2001. Tom obtained a Bachelor of Science degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Worcester Polytechnic Institute.
